channel.title: How to make a npc agresive
channel.description: Can any plz tell me how to make a npc agressive..so that like when u come near it,it attacks you, but i dont want all my npc's to b agressive just some..

item.title: How to make a npc agresive
item.dc:creator: @d10n d10n
item.description:
@d10n wrote:

okay…

open your npchandler.java

search for
Code:

if (person.distanceToPoint

and you should see
Code:

if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 5)

under it add
Code:

if (npcs[i].npcType = NPCID)

//NPCID = id of npc u wana make agresive

then look down and ull see
Code:

if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel)

and
Code:

else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel)

under them add
Code:

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID)

the npc id after ==

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a npc agresive
